text: Ezɨ Daniel irebamɨn mɨngarim gɨfogha gɨfa, kamaghɨn amizɨma a bar osemegha dɨgavir kuram gamigha, atrivimɨn mɨkɨman atiati.4:19 Akar kam, 4:19ɨn ikegha ghua 4:33ɨn tu, kar akar otevir mam Atrivim Nebukatnesar gumazamiziba bagha anemada. (Nɨ Daniel 4:1ɨn ganigh.) Egha kagh atrivim bizir a bativizibagh eghanizir puvatɨ. Ezɨ atrivim kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Beltesasar, irebar kam ko an mɨngarim nɨ damutɨ nɨ osɨmɨva atiatingan markɨ.”
